page.title: 03JOB SURVEY,CASTLETOWN
page.content: This survey is based on the family breadwinners of the pupils attending Castletown School.We found that { {unemployment}among these breadwinners is 12%.Of those in full_time employment,the largest number,21%,work at{Dounreay Nuclear Power Development {Establishment}about 15 miles from Castletown.19% work from home,mostly {farmers,}but there are some {self_employed}joiners,architects, insurance salesmen etc.Only 9% of breadwinners work in{Castletown}.16% work in{Thurso},but only 3% travel to {Wick.}There are two{American Naval {Bases}in Caithness ,one at Murkle and one at Forss.9% of the breadwinners work at these naval bases.Some of them are civilian workers ,but most of them are American personnel.6% of the people work off shore on{North Sea { oil rigs.
